overview:
Ned is co-founder and Vice President of marketing for RowNine.com where he is responsible strategy, product development, and merchandising.

Prior to co-founding RowNine, Ned was Director of Business Development at Yahoo! from 1997-2003 where he was responsible for managing partnerships with leading Fortune 100 software, computer and Telecom companies including HP, IBM, AT&T and SAP.

Prior to joining Yahoo! Ned was Senior Manager of Business Development at Excite.com where he managed content and distribution relationships with major media companies.

Ned began his career in Sales & Marketing in the media industry working for Knight Ridder and the New York Times. Ned graduated from Connecticut College with a M.A in Economics and History and earned MBA from Babson College. Ned is a native of Boston and resides in the Bay Area with his wife and two daughters.
